citations.narrative:
In the enclosure housing three bears, there are multiple areas that are not in good repair. There is an old shelter structure
that has sections of rusted, broken metal as well as exposed wires with sharp points. Two metal poles have spots near
the ground where the metal has rusted away and created a hole, impacting the structural integrity and creating sharp
edges. The wooden shelter structure in the main area has two places where the wood has deteriorated, leaving the nail
heads exposed.
Areas in the enclosure that are sharp or broken can lead to injury of the animals. All housing facilities shall be structurally
sound and shall be maintained in good repair to protect the animals from injury and to contain the animals.
To be corrected by March 1, 2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
